item.title: What's Wrong With My Code?
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

I made a boolean:

[CODE]public boolean online()
{
if (disconnected = false)
{
return true;
}

    if (disconnected = true)
    {			return false;
	}

}[/CODE]

and an if statement:

if (online()) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in!"; online = false; }
and got an error:

client.java:12574: cannot find symbol symbol : variable online location: class client online = false; ^
They are both really small pieces of code and I don’t understand why I’m getting this error. I’m guessing it’s a silly mistake or a typo. Help me out!

~Nets8

Read full topic
